data.text: O Israelviwo, mise Yehowa ƒe nyawo.
Mietaa nu, hedaa alakpa, wua ame,
“Ame aɖeke megatsɔ nya ɖe nɔvia ŋu
Eya ta mi kple míaƒe nyagblɔɖilawo
Le simadzemadze ta nye amewo le tsɔtsrɔ̃m, esi mi,
Zi ale si nunɔlawo le agbɔ sɔm ɖe edzi la,
Nunɔlawo hã kpɔa dzidzɔ le ameawo ƒe nu vɔ̃ ŋu,
eye wotsɔ wo ɖokuiwo na gbolowɔwɔ, wain,
Elabena wole gbe biam ati si nye nu dzodzro la
“Nu ka ta nyemahe to na wo
“Togbɔ be Israel le gbolo wɔm hã la,
Mègate ɖe Efraim ŋu kura o,
Ne Israel ŋutsuwo no aha tsu vɔ la,
eya ta ya sesẽ aɖe ava ƒo wo adzoe,
